description: Researchers used quantum simulations to obtain new insights into the nature of neutrinos—the mysterious subatomic particles that abound throughout the universe—and their role in the deaths of massive stars.
title: Untangling the entangled: Quantum study shines fresh light on how neutrinos fuel supernovae

description: NASA said on Friday the Boeing Starliner's return to Earth from the International Space Station, which was scheduled for next week, has been delayed again.
title: Boeing Starliner's return to Earth delayed again

description: The Italian island of Capri banned tourists from disembarking Saturday after problems with the water supply from the mainland threatened to leave the holiday hotspot parched.
title: Tourists banned from Italy's Capri over water shortage

description: The European eel Anguilla anguilla, a sleek, snake-like fish with a fascinating life cycle, once teemed in rivers. But their numbers have plummeted by more than 95% since the 1980s.
title: We've found a way to help endangered eels overcome dams and weirs

description: What did scientists do this week? Exactly four things, all of which are summarized below.
title: Saturday Citations: Bulking tips for black holes; microbes influence drinking; new dinosaur just dropped

description: How do you find out the age of a wild animal? For some Australian marsupials, we have discovered you can tell from their teeth.
title: Kangaroo teeth grow forever—and keep a record of their owner's age and sex

description: Protected areas, like nature reserves, can conserve biodiversity without harming local economic growth, countering a common belief that conservation restricts development. A new study outlines what is needed for conservation to benefit both nature and people.
title: Protected areas can boost biodiversity and local economies

description: An American family is claiming more than $80,000 from NASA after a small piece of debris fell from space and smashed through the roof of their Florida home, a law firm said Friday.
title: NASA faces $80,000 claim after space debris hit family home

description: Torrential rains across Central America have left at least 27 dead in landslides and flooding over the past week, mainly in El Salvador, but also in Guatemala and Honduras, officials said Friday.
title: Torrential rains kill 27 across Central America

description: In the Mexican desert near the US border, security forces are on alert after a man was found dead from heat stroke on the journey to what he hoped would be a better life in North America.
title: Extreme heat is new danger stalking US-bound migrants

description: Each year from June to September, a heavy band of rain makes its way from India's southwest coast to its northeastern borders, quenching farmers' thirsty fields.
title: Climate change makes India's monsoons erratic. Can farmers still find a way to prosper?

description: A French-Chinese satellite will blast off Saturday on a hunt for the mightiest explosions in the universe, in a notable example of cooperation between a Western power and the Asian giant.
title: China, France to launch satellite to better understand the universe
